content:
Music & Art

A lifelong passion for music and the atmospheric aesthetics of Tim Burton's cinematography.

The Lore

Deeply inspired by the worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien (Lord of the Rings) and the timeless action of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

History & Culture

An enthusiast of Mayan culture and its incredible astronomical and mathematical legacy.

My Companion

In my free time, you'll find me with my dog, likely exploring or relaxing in a watercolor-inspired setting.
title: Personal Life: Beyond the Code
